title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: Learn supervised, unsupervised learning, and ML pipelines from Andrew Ng.

title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Covers deep neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and sequence models.

description: Covers Python, SQL, data analysis, and visualization techniques.

title: Python for Everybody
description: Learn Python basics including functions, loops, and web scraping.

title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases.

description: Learn React.js, hooks, state management, and deployment.

description: Learn REST APIs, authentication, and MongoDB with Node.js.

title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials
description: Learn basics of AWS cloud, services, and architecture.

title: Google Cloud Fundamentals
description: Introduction to Google Cloud services and deployment models.

title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
description: Covers Azure cloud services and infrastructure basics.

title: Kubernetes for Beginners
description: Learn container orchestration using Kubernetes.

title: Docker Mastery
description: Learn containerization using Docker, Docker Compose, and Docker Swarm.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Basics of cybersecurity, encryption, and risk management.

title: Ethical Hacking for Beginners
description: Learn penetration testing and ethical hacking basics.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python
description: Learn problem-solving using Python DS & Algo.

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Fundamentals of AI, history, and applications.

title: Natural Language Processing with Python
description: Learn text processing, sentiment analysis, and transformers.

title: Computer Vision with TensorFlow
description: Learn CNNs, image classification, and object detection.

title: Big Data with Hadoop and Spark
description: Learn distributed data processing using Hadoop and Spark.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
description: Learn SQL queries, joins, and aggregations for analytics.

title: Excel for Business Analytics
description: Learn Excel functions, pivot tables, and dashboards.

title: Business Analytics with R
description: Learn business decision-making using R.

title: Tableau for Data Visualization
description: Learn interactive dashboards and visual storytelling.

title: Power BI for Beginners
description: Create interactive BI dashboards with Power BI.

title: DevOps Foundations
description: Learn CI/CD, automation, and DevOps tools.

title: Agile Project Management
description: Learn Scrum, Kanban, and Agile methodologies.

title: Blockchain Basics
description: Introduction to blockchain technology and use cases.

title: Introduction to Quantum Computing
description: Covers basics of qubits, quantum gates, and algorithms.

title: Linux Command Line Basics
description: Learn shell scripting, file management, and permissions.

title: Git and GitHub for Developers
description: Learn version control, branching, and collaboration.

title: Artificial Intelligence for Business
description: Learn how AI is applied in business contexts.

title: Applied Data Science with Python
description: Learn applied machine learning and visualization using Python.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS and Azure
